storyInfo: The moment the first round hunt for Pure Gold begins, LUNG wRATh finds themselves encircled by other teams.

attributes.content: Welcome, dear audience, to the eve of your mightily awaited Eighth Dossoles Warrior Champion!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Before we part the curtains, why don't we invite our beloved Mayor Candela up for the opening speech?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Citizens, tourists, with great pride in this city, I welcome you to Dossoles!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: It doesn't matter where you're from. It doesn't matter who you are.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: You've made it here, so let all that fall away.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Enjoy everything our city has to give you. Enjoy everything you deserve.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Be happy, laugh happy, shout and scream happy.
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: This is the paradise I built, and it's all for you!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Now come! The most unforgettable time of your life is here for the taking!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: Okay, big thank-you to Mayor Candela for that speech, just as sempiternally scorched with passion, alright. Moving on, time to introduce your contestants.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Lots of familiar faces this year and last year, but plenty of new ones too!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: First order of business, they look like a lovey-dovey couple, they ARE a lovey-dovey couple, but they're a force on the fighting front!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Honey Summer!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: The power of love brought us together.
attributes.name: Impatient Male Tourist

attributes.content: The power of love brought us our love.
attributes.name: Sluggish Female Tourist

attributes.content: The power of our love is unmatched!
attributes.name: Male & Female Tourist

attributes.content: Even I can barely stand before that sparkly power of love! Let's see just how far love's legs can run!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Solo unit up next, the contestant who won the Stomach King Prelims, Mizuki!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Harmless as he looks, he ate through an entire restaurant warehouse. That bottomless stomach and that blue hair are begging to synergize with the ocean here.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Pacer-man!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Hallo, hallo, hey everyone.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Contestant Mizuki, would you like to say a few words to stir the hearts of the people?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Hm... I'll eat you all up once I'm tired of playing.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Ooooh! Contestant Mizuki, utterer of terrifying statements in completely normal voices! We look forward to seeing you out there!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Next up, it's a local team, led by Miss Rafaela, who may look cute, but she's got a giant, fiendish sickle. That's the kind of contrast this team's here to feed you.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Let's welcome up—the Grey Feathers!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Hello to you all.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Miss Rafaela, what do you have to say before the tournament?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Um... I'll do my best.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Ooh, alright, alright, sometimes it's the simple things that touch us deep! Grey Feathers, I think you'll go far!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Right after that, it's a newcomer to this competition, but the team that's drawn the most buzz!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: They're the live scrimmage gatecrashers, winners with an attitude no-one could answer, the supernovas who've picked up Mr. Pancho's support!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: They came from a place the City of Two Suns loves dearly—the Lungmen heroines, Miss Lin Yühsia, Miss Ch'en Hui-chieh, and we even get the local arms dealer, Mr. Ernesto, completing this team—
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: —LUNG wRATh!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Strong, fresh teams spike an appetite like nothing else, and their odds are sitting high! But! Do you truly dare to put your chips down on them?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Alright, let's get your statement. Team leader?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Who's the leader?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Ernesto, you do it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: There's no way Lin Yühsia's going to take what I say.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And you wouldn't take what I say either.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Er, alright.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: In that case, we proclaim—we're going to carve our mark into this competition's history!
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: How was that?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Mediocre.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Agreed.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Thought so.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Massively assertive! Let's look forward to LUNG wRATh and their vivid display.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Moving on, our next team is...
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Hey, Missy, this way.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Coming! Hey, watch my ice cream!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Really, this crowd is insane...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Just goes to show how much attention's on this contest.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Anyway, you see that? Ch'en's carrying some gun-ish thing for some reason.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Guess she's not planning to use her sword this time.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: She's set herself up badly, hasn't she? She was about as good at firearms training as I was.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Wow. Excellence doesn't just grow on trees, okay?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Calling her swordsmanship 'excellent' undersells it.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hey, Missy, I gotta say, you're an even bigger Ch'en fan than me, behind her back.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm just stating facts, okay.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah. More importantly, though, seeing Ch'en without a sword is a sight to treasure. Let's go ask the organizers if we can get a recording of this.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Let's not. That would be hell.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What's to be so embarrassed about? We'll cut it into a flick. I've already got the title. It'll be 'Gunslinger Old Ch'en Grasps Great Lung Power.'
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And I gotta say, you might have a talent for directing awful B movies.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm flattered. Oh, right, Missy. I've got something to talk to you about.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Not happening.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: C'mon, I haven't even said what it is.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You said 'something to talk about' and I nearly threw up my ice cream. Nothing good comes out of that phrasing.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hey. No, just, I saw the officials here had an event on for the spectators.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I looked into it. They let you guess who'll win. And there's a bunch of smaller ones, like who'll be first to get gold, who'll get eliminated earliest, and...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The way you use the word 'guess' absolutely floors me.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It's government-sponsored. Ship-shape and legal.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ugh. What even goes for illegal in this city?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Yeah... good point, but right now we're just regular tourists, y'know? It's beyond our job descriptions.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And look, even if you want to laugh at Ch'en and Miss Lin, just suppose they do win, we won't be out of pocket, right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Makes it a win-win, Missy.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Sigh*... I give in. Here's my card.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Mighty thanks, Milady.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Don't go splashing it about!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I hear you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Alright, that's all forty teams.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Cameras and drones will capture the whole thing, ensuring you don't miss a single beautiful shot.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: And this main stage isn't gonna stand alone, either. The officials have set up ten more, each one with its own dedicated presenter.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: So you'll get every second, and with commentary just as brilliant to match.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Plus, once the opening ceremony begins, we've got a little wagering opportuntiy for you audience-siders, to make the competition that much spicier.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: All spectators are invited to register your info on the government site, and you can make yourself a little extra cash!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: For specifics on how it'll work, refer to your government-issued competition guides.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Now, then. All the competitors are in our starting district and readied up.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Round 1 will be a search—and a struggle—for pure gold in a partitioned-off area. Teams will then hand it directly to staff at the finish point.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: But, they're also allowed to shoot for more! Whatever gold they get belongs to them!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Alright! Mayor Candela, fire off the salute and signal the start of this competition!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: I declare—Round 1 has officially begun!
attributes.name: Candela

attributes.content: What now?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: We split up.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And avoid working together. It seems we have yet another common understanding.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: However, before that. We're already being watched.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.text: Sweeping the surroundings, Ch'en notices a dozen people already surrounding the three of them, closing in with malicious intent.

attributes.content: We break out first.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.text: Lin Yühsia faintly nods. Accompanied by only a brush of her hand on the window next to her, the glass gradually vanishes as if melting.
Straight after, a knife blade appears from her palm, almost colorless, only its reflection of the subtle sunshine rays proving its existence.

attributes.content: Oooh, Round 1 of the championship has begun, and the highly anticipated LUNG wRATh has had three other teams cooperate to target them!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Either side is poised to fight!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Will LUNG wRATh once again show their true power, or will the teams united take the win? Let's hold on tight!
attributes.name: D.D.D.
